allowExportEncKey.name: Allow export the encrypt key
allowExportEncKey.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否显示加密密钥导出窗口
allowExportEncKey.description: It's used to control whether or not the encryption key export window is displayed

encryptAlgorithm.name: Encrypt algorithm
encryptAlgorithm.description[zh_CN]: 分区加密所使用的默认加密算法
encryptAlgorithm.description: It's the default algorithm for encrypting partitions

enableEncrypt.name: Enable partition encrypt
enableEncrypt.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制分区加密功能是否在文管启用
enableEncrypt.description: It's used to control whether to enable partition encryption feature in dde-file-manager.

tpmPrimaryHashAlgoName.name: 主钥哈希算法
tpmPrimaryHashAlgoName.description: 主钥哈希算法，可选算法有(sha256,sm3_256)
tpmPrimaryHashAlgoName.description[zh_CN]: 主钥哈希算法，可选算法有(sha256,sm3_256)

tpmPrimaryKeyAlgoName.name: 主钥秘钥算法
tpmPrimaryKeyAlgoName.description: 主钥秘钥算法，可选算法有(sm4,rsa)
tpmPrimaryKeyAlgoName.description[zh_CN]: 主钥秘钥算法，可选算法有(sm4,rsa)

tpmMinorHashAlgoName.name: 次钥哈希算法
tpmMinorHashAlgoName.description: 次钥哈希算法，可选算法有(sha256, sm3_256)
tpmMinorHashAlgoName.description[zh_CN]: 次钥哈希算法，可选算法有(sha256, sm3_256)

tpmMinorKeyAlgoName.name: 次钥秘钥算法
tpmMinorKeyAlgoName.description: 次钥秘钥算法，可选算法有(sm4, aes 等)
tpmMinorKeyAlgoName.description[zh_CN]: 次钥秘钥算法，可选算法有(sm4, aes 等)

tpmPcrBank.name: 寄存器哈希算法
tpmPcrBank.description: 寄存器哈希算法，取值范围(sm3_256,sha256)
tpmPcrBank.description[zh_CN]: 寄存器哈希算法，取值范围(sm3_256,sha256)

useOverlayDMMode.name: Use Overlay DM Mode
useOverlayDMMode.name[zh_CN]: 使用 Overlay DM 模式
useOverlayDMMode.description: Enable overlay device mapper mode for partition encryption. When this option is enabled and system rebooted, subsequent partition encryption operations will not require reboot. When disabled and system rebooted, partition encryption operations will require reboot to complete.
useOverlayDMMode.description[zh_CN]: 启用 Overlay Device Mapper 分区加密模式。当启用该选项并重启系统后，后续的分区加密操作将无需重启；当关闭该选项并重启系统后，后续的分区加密操作将需要重启才能完成。
